mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, parent_id, order_num, url, type, hide, is_new, NVL(perms,'') AS perms, IFNULL(perms,'') AS perms, COALESCE(perms,'') AS perms, ISNULL(perms,'') AS perms, target, icon,module_codes, create_by, create_time FROM sys_menu

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide, m.is_new, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms,m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM(SELECT a.*,SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( a.module_codes, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',',- 1 ) AS cs FROM sys_menu a JOIN sys_index b ON b.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH( a.module_codes ) - LENGTH( REPLACE ( a.module_codes, ',', '' ) ) + 1)) AS m

SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide, m.is_new, NVL(m.perms,'') AS perms,m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM (SELECT DISTINCT REGEXP_SUBSTR(t.module_codes, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS cs,t.* FROM sys_menu t CONNECT BY LEVEL <= regexp_count(t.module_codes, ',') + 1 ) m

SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.is_new, m.hide, COALESCE(m.perms,'') AS perms,m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM (SELECT UNNEST(STRING_TO_ARRAY(t.module_codes,',')) AS cs,t.* FROM sys_menu t ) m

SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.is_new, m.hide, ISNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms,m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM (SELECT v.value AS cs,t.* FROM sys_menu t CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(t.module_codes, ',')v) m
mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.name AS name, m.parent_id AS parentId, m.order_num AS orderNum, m.url AS url, m.type AS type, m.hide AS hide, m.target AS target,m.module_codes AS moduleCodes, m.is_new AS isNew, m.icon AS icon, NVL(m.perms,'') AS perms, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, COALESCE(m.perms,'') AS perms, ISNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, rm.name AS parentName FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,name FROM sys_menu) rm ON m.parent_id = rm.id WHERE m.id = #{menuId}
WHERE type != 2 ORDER BY order_num ASC
WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND sys_menu.hide = 0 ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT perms FROM sys_role_menu rel INNER JOIN sys_menu m ON rel.menu_id = m.id WHERE perms IS NOT NULL AND perms != '' AND rel.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT concat(m.id, NVL(m.perms,'') IFNULL(m.perms,'') COALESCE(m.perms,'') ISNULL(m.perms,'') ) AS perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num

AND name LIKE
'%,'||#{name}||',%' CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND hide = #{hide}
ORDER BY parent_id, order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide, m.is_new, NVL(m.perms,'') AS perms, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, COALESCE(m.perms,'') AS perms, ISNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ur.role_id = ro.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
